com.here.android.mpa.mapping

Interface Map.InfoBubbleAdapter

  • Enclosing class:
    Map
    Deprecated. 
    As of SDK 3.1.2. Use MapOverlay instead.

    @Deprecated
public static interface Map.InfoBubbleAdapter
    Interface for implementing custom info bubbles for MapMarker objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.view.View getInfoBubble(MapMarker marker)
      Deprecated. 
      Provide a custom info bubble for the marker.
      android.view.View getInfoBubbleContents(MapMarker marker)
      Deprecated. 
      Provide custom contents for the info bubble.

    • Method Detail

      • getInfoBubbleContents

        android.view.View getInfoBubbleContents(MapMarker marker)
        Deprecated. 
        Provide custom contents for the info bubble.
        Parameters:
        marker - The MapMarker that this info bubble is associated with.
        Returns:
        The view for the contents of this bubble or null if the implementer wishes to use the default info bubble.

      • getInfoBubble

        android.view.View getInfoBubble(MapMarker marker)
        Deprecated. 
        Provide a custom info bubble for the marker.
        Parameters:
        marker - The MapMarker that this bubble is associated with.
        Returns:
        The view for this bubble (including frame) or null if the implementer wishes to use Map.InfoBubbleAdapter.getInfoBubbleContents(MapMarker).
